description:
In "GetResponse - Email Marketing Techniques For Beginners", you are going to learn some of the most common and used email marketing techniques.

Email marketing continues to be one of the best online marketing tools out there, and it also accounts for huge ROI.

Some of the topics we are going to be talking about include: split-tests, webforms, automation, campaigns, conversion rates, newsletters and more. However, lead generation strategies will not be included in the course, please take this fact into consideration before enrolling.

All of the successful online marketers and figures have something in common - an email list. Some people have lists of 100.000 subscribers while others 1 million or even more and guess what happens when they launch a new digital product - millions of dollars are generated in a matter of hours, not days or months.

Therefore, I strongly advise you to learn the fundamentals of an auto-response email service such as GetResponse or Aweber. This actually is the purpose of the course - to teach you the fundamentals.

Disclaimer:

As an instructor, I am not associated with GetResponse in any way, I won't be offering affiliate links or something that would benefit me in case you start using GetResponse.
title: Getresponse - Email Marketing Techniques For Beginners
